name: FSX | PMDG 777 Base Package
description:
2018 EDIT - I made this over 5 years ago when the aircraft was originally released, and didn't really put much thought into this "review", just wanting to be one of the first people to make a video on the PMDG 777. If you're genuinely here to find out whether you should buy it or not, take what I say with a grain of salt. :)

Thanks for watching.

Buy it now: http://www.precisionmanuals.com/pages/product/777LRF.html

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

ADDONS USED:
ORBX Northern Rocky Mountains Package
PMDG 777-200LR/F Base Package
Ezdok Camera
FSRecorder
